name: Fix My Legs Doc
description:
The car has wheels, the plane has wings, and the man has FEETS.

Who will take care of our health if not us? Fix My Legs Doc, is a simulation game in which you have the chance to be a Doctor, where your mission is to help different patients to heal their legs to feel good.

What are you waiting for? Enter the role of doctor right now!

Game Features :
- Various cases with fractures or infections of the leg (use of ointment, patch, x-ray)
- A lot of patients waiting for help
- Real life sim & very realistic
